00041 int BLI_rcti_is_empty(rcti * rect)
00042 {
00043     return ((rect->xmax <= rect->xmin) || (rect->ymax <= rect->ymin));
00044 }
00045 
00046 int BLI_rctf_is_empty(rctf * rect)
00047 {
00048     return ((rect->xmax <= rect->xmin) || (rect->ymax <= rect->ymin));
00049 }
00050 
00051 int BLI_in_rcti(rcti * rect, int x, int y)
00052 {
00053     if (x < rect->xmin) return 0;
00054     if (x > rect->xmax) return 0;
00055     if (y < rect->ymin) return 0;
00056     if (y > rect->ymax) return 0;
00057     return 1;
00058 }
00059 
00060 int BLI_in_rctf(rctf *rect, float x, float y)
00061 {
00062     if (x < rect->xmin) return 0;
00063     if (x > rect->xmax) return 0;
00064     if (y < rect->ymin) return 0;
00065     if (y > rect->ymax) return 0;
00066     return 1;
00067 }
00068 
00069 /* based closely on 'isect_line_line_v2_int', but in modified so corner cases are treated as intersections */
00070 static int isect_segments(const int v1[2], const int v2[2], const int v3[2], const int v4[2])
00071 {
00072     const double div = (double)((v2[0] - v1[0]) * (v4[1] - v3[1]) - (v2[1] - v1[1]) * (v4[0] - v3[0]));
00073     if (div == 0.0f) {
00074         return 1; /* co-linear */
00075     }
00076     else {
00077         const double labda = (double)((v1[1] - v3[1]) * (v4[0] - v3[0]) - (v1[0] - v3[0]) * (v4[1] - v3[1])) / div;
00078         const double mu    = (double)((v1[1] - v3[1]) * (v2[0] - v1[0]) - (v1[0] - v3[0]) * (v2[1] - v1[1])) / div;
00079         return (labda >= 0.0f && labda <= 1.0f && mu >= 0.0f && mu <= 1.0f);
00080     }
00081 }
00082 
00083 int BLI_segment_in_rcti(rcti *rect, int s1[2], int s2[2])
00084 {
00085     /* first do outside-bounds check for both points of the segment */
00086     if (s1[0] < rect->xmin && s2[0] < rect->xmin) return 0;
00087     if (s1[0] > rect->xmax && s2[0] > rect->xmax) return 0;
00088     if (s1[1] < rect->ymin && s2[1] < rect->ymin) return 0;
00089     if (s1[1] > rect->ymax && s2[1] > rect->ymax) return 0;
00090 
00091     /* if either points intersect then we definetly intersect */
00092     if (BLI_in_rcti(rect, s1[0], s1[1]) || BLI_in_rcti(rect, s2[0], s2[1])) {
00093         return 1;
00094     }
00095     else {
00096         /* both points are outside but may insersect the rect */
00097         int tvec1[2];
00098         int tvec2[2];
00099         /* diagonal: [/] */
00100         tvec1[0] = rect->xmin; tvec1[1] = rect->ymin;
00101         tvec2[0] = rect->xmin; tvec2[1] = rect->ymax;
00102         if (isect_segments(s1, s2, tvec1, tvec2)) {
00103             return 1;
00104         }
00105 
00106         /* diagonal: [\] */
00107         tvec1[0] = rect->xmin; tvec1[1] = rect->ymax;
00108         tvec2[0] = rect->xmax; tvec2[1] = rect->ymin;
00109         if (isect_segments(s1, s2, tvec1, tvec2)) {
00110             return 1;
00111         }
00112 
00113         /* no intersection */
00114         return 0;
00115     }
00116 }

00118 void BLI_union_rctf(rctf *rct1, rctf *rct2)
00119 {
00120     if (rct1->xmin > rct2->xmin) rct1->xmin = rct2->xmin;
00121     if (rct1->xmax < rct2->xmax) rct1->xmax = rct2->xmax;
00122     if (rct1->ymin > rct2->ymin) rct1->ymin = rct2->ymin;
00123     if (rct1->ymax < rct2->ymax) rct1->ymax = rct2->ymax;
00124 }
00125 
00126 void BLI_union_rcti(rcti *rct1, rcti *rct2)
00127 {
00128     if (rct1->xmin > rct2->xmin) rct1->xmin = rct2->xmin;
00129     if (rct1->xmax < rct2->xmax) rct1->xmax = rct2->xmax;
00130     if (rct1->ymin > rct2->ymin) rct1->ymin = rct2->ymin;
00131     if (rct1->ymax < rct2->ymax) rct1->ymax = rct2->ymax;
00132 }

00134 void BLI_init_rctf(rctf *rect, float xmin, float xmax, float ymin, float ymax)
00135 {
00136     if (xmin <= xmax) {
00137         rect->xmin = xmin;
00138         rect->xmax = xmax;
00139     }
00140     else {
00141         rect->xmax = xmin;
00142         rect->xmin = xmax;
00143     }
00144     if (ymin <= ymax) {
00145         rect->ymin = ymin;
00146         rect->ymax = ymax;
00147     }
00148     else {
00149         rect->ymax = ymin;
00150         rect->ymin = ymax;
00151     }
00152 }
00153 
00154 void BLI_init_rcti(rcti *rect, int xmin, int xmax, int ymin, int ymax)
00155 {
00156     if (xmin <= xmax) {
00157         rect->xmin = xmin;
00158         rect->xmax = xmax;
00159     }
00160     else {
00161         rect->xmax = xmin;
00162         rect->xmin = xmax;
00163     }
00164     if (ymin <= ymax) {
00165         rect->ymin = ymin;
00166         rect->ymax = ymax;
00167     }
00168     else {
00169         rect->ymax = ymin;
00170         rect->ymin = ymax;
00171     }
00172 }

00174 void BLI_translate_rcti(rcti *rect, int x, int y)
00175 {
00176     rect->xmin += x;
00177     rect->ymin += y;
00178     rect->xmax += x;
00179     rect->ymax += y;
00180 }
00181 void BLI_translate_rctf(rctf *rect, float x, float y)
00182 {
00183     rect->xmin += x;
00184     rect->ymin += y;
00185     rect->xmax += x;
00186     rect->ymax += y;
00187 }

00189 /* change width & height around the central location */
00190 void BLI_resize_rcti(rcti *rect, int x, int y)
00191 {
00192     rect->xmin = rect->xmax = (rect->xmax + rect->xmin) / 2;
00193     rect->ymin = rect->ymax = (rect->ymax + rect->ymin) / 2;
00194     rect->xmin -= x / 2;
00195     rect->ymin -= y / 2;
00196     rect->xmax = rect->xmin + x;
00197     rect->ymax = rect->ymin + y;
00198 }
00199 
00200 void BLI_resize_rctf(rctf *rect, float x, float y)
00201 {
00202     rect->xmin = rect->xmax = (rect->xmax + rect->xmin) * 0.5f;
00203     rect->ymin = rect->ymax = (rect->ymax + rect->ymin) * 0.5f;
00204     rect->xmin -= x * 0.5f;
00205     rect->ymin -= y * 0.5f;
00206     rect->xmax = rect->xmin + x;
00207     rect->ymax = rect->ymin + y;
00208 }
00209 
00210 int BLI_isect_rctf(rctf *src1, rctf *src2, rctf *dest)
00211 {
00212     float xmin, xmax;
00213     float ymin, ymax;
00214 
00215     xmin = (src1->xmin) > (src2->xmin) ? (src1->xmin) : (src2->xmin);
00216     xmax = (src1->xmax) < (src2->xmax) ? (src1->xmax) : (src2->xmax);
00217     ymin = (src1->ymin) > (src2->ymin) ? (src1->ymin) : (src2->ymin);
00218     ymax = (src1->ymax) < (src2->ymax) ? (src1->ymax) : (src2->ymax);
00219 
00220     if (xmax >= xmin && ymax >= ymin) {
00221         if (dest) {
00222             dest->xmin = xmin;
00223             dest->xmax = xmax;
00224             dest->ymin = ymin;
00225             dest->ymax = ymax;
00226         }
00227         return 1;
00228     }
00229     else {
00230         if (dest) {
00231             dest->xmin = 0;
00232             dest->xmax = 0;
00233             dest->ymin = 0;
00234             dest->ymax = 0;
00235         }
00236         return 0;
00237     }
00238 }
00239 
00240 int BLI_isect_rcti(rcti *src1, rcti *src2, rcti *dest)
00241 {
00242     int xmin, xmax;
00243     int ymin, ymax;
00244 
00245     xmin = (src1->xmin) > (src2->xmin) ? (src1->xmin) : (src2->xmin);
00246     xmax = (src1->xmax) < (src2->xmax) ? (src1->xmax) : (src2->xmax);
00247     ymin = (src1->ymin) > (src2->ymin) ? (src1->ymin) : (src2->ymin);
00248     ymax = (src1->ymax) < (src2->ymax) ? (src1->ymax) : (src2->ymax);
00249 
00250     if (xmax >= xmin && ymax >= ymin) {
00251         if (dest) {
00252             dest->xmin = xmin;
00253             dest->xmax = xmax;
00254             dest->ymin = ymin;
00255             dest->ymax = ymax;
00256         }
00257         return 1;
00258     }
00259     else {
00260         if (dest) {
00261             dest->xmin = 0;
00262             dest->xmax = 0;
00263             dest->ymin = 0;
00264             dest->ymax = 0;
00265         }
00266         return 0;
00267     }
00268 }
00269 
00270 void BLI_copy_rcti_rctf(rcti *tar, const rctf *src)
00271 {
00272     tar->xmin = floor(src->xmin + 0.5f);
00273     tar->xmax = floor((src->xmax - src->xmin) + 0.5f);
00274     tar->ymin = floor(src->ymin + 0.5f);
00275     tar->ymax = floor((src->ymax - src->ymin) + 0.5f);
00276 }

00278 void print_rctf(const char *str, rctf *rect)
00279 {
00280     printf("%s: xmin %.3f, xmax %.3f, ymin %.3f, ymax %.3f (%.3fx%.3f)\n", str,
00281            rect->xmin, rect->xmax, rect->ymin, rect->ymax, rect->xmax - rect->xmin, rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00282 }
00283 
00284 void print_rcti(const char *str, rcti *rect)
00285 {
00286     printf("%s: xmin %d, xmax %d, ymin %d, ymax %d (%dx%d)\n", str,
00287            rect->xmin, rect->xmax, rect->ymin, rect->ymax, rect->xmax - rect->xmin, rect->ymax - rect->ymin);
00288 }
